name: chosencaregroup
0:
”Alexa open chosen care group”
”Alexa ask chosen care group about chosen care group”
”Alexa ask chosen care group how to apply for a job”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chosen care group
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is intended to answer frequently asked questions regarding company information. It answers questions like about the company, what are the services provided in the company,where are the services provided,opening and closing office hours,how to complain, and how they can apply for a job. When they want to apply for a job, alexa asks which country they are based in and asks for their mobile no and sends a URL link to their mobile no. The link takes them to the company's career page.
